humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the invasive ductal carcinoma measures 3 cm in greatest dimension, which falls within the T2 stage range of more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm (T2 tumors). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is reported as 3 cm in greatest dimension in the pathology report, which falls under T2 classification (T2: Tumor size 2.1 to 5 cm) according to the TNM staging system for cancer. The T stage does not include information about the substaging.
